alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:59PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Saline and central Pulaski Counties through 230 PM CDT... At 159 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southwest Little Rock, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Sherwood... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... Southwest Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... Argenta... Otter Creek... Burns Park... Ironton... Chenal Valley... Oak Grove in Pulaski County... Protho Junction... Sweet Home... Lakewood... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 126 and 142. Interstate 40 between mile markers 146 and 157. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 12. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 6. Interstate 630 between mile markers 1 and 7. Interstate 440 between mile markers 1 and 7. US Highway 67 between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
